body_html:
@mirh ,yeah, I am not familiar with bazel tools ,But I guess that some Configuration may not be appropriate because I find that in /third_party/sycl/sycl/BUILD.tpl some configuration confuse me.
In that file
config_setting(
name = "using_sycl_ccpp",
define_values = {
"using_sycl": "true",
"using_trisycl": "false",
},
)

config_setting(
name = "using_sycl_trisycl",
define_values = {
"using_sycl": "true",
"using_trisycl": "false",
},
)
that the setting named "using_sycl_ccpp" whosed define_values are same as "using_sycl_trisycl",,there must be some conflict in cuda's configruation cause the same error。but It's difficault for me to handle the problem . Just wait for someone is good at bazel to handle the problem.
